name: Finch Green Nai Miris Powder
description: Finch Green Nai Miris powder is notoriously fiery, with an intense heat that will not go unnoticed in your recipes! You only need a pinch of this spicy Green Nai Miris powder, as a little goes a long way. Unless of course, intense fiery foods are your thing! *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
